pages.text: Hummingbirds are tiny passive bird creatures that can be found in flower forests, sunflower plains and jungles.$(br2)Hummingbirds really love flowers and often pollinate them.$(br2)The player can craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/hummingbird_feeder)Hummingbird Feeder$(/l), which will keep them from straying. It will also boost their pollination rate.
The player can breed them with flowers.
